N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 85-3.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The following applications for a
major utility
transmission facility, as that term is defined in section
120
(2)(a)
of the Public Service Law, shall, upon
the request of the applicant, be subject to the expedited process: (a) applications for a facility that would be
constructed within existing rights-of-way; (b) applications for a facility that the
commission determines in consultation with the Department of Environmental

Conservation would not result in any significant adverse environmental impacts, considering the current uses and conditions existing at the site; and
(c) applications for a facility where
expansion of existing rights-of-way is necessary for the purpose of complying
with law, regulations, or industry practices relating to electromagnetic
fields. Notes
